divs: Sighting DetailsOk me and my friend where waiting in the pontiac northern high school parking lot for her friend we were going to a club and i look up because i saw something out of the corner of my eye.So i am standing there looking at this object and i keep tellin everyone to look up at it but they don't believe me.so i am standing there for about ten minutes watching this thing and it's just there in the sky hovering there like nothing it had blue,green,red and white lights on it blinking in a what looked like a pattern but i couldn't tell anyways it's just there right and what seemed really strange about it was its shape it was weird if you took a piece of paper and drew two lines same lenght one on top then one on bottom the drew the ends in a point.so it was there for ten minutes then it fadded a way and then we wen't about are what we where doing
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Pontiac
There were no other sightings in Pontiac on or around August 14th 2007
Summary: The object had blue,green,red and white lights on the outside of it. the object was flat on top and had pointed sides i noticed it in the sky it didn't move for the event but then it just fadded out
